name: call-a-technician-unified
description: Call-a-Technician unified project with marketing site and admin portal

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:marketing" "npm run dev:portal"

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:marketing && npm run install:portal
